<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// However, if either element/field of the aggregate is a non-NULL address,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
